blog.name: ariixnya03
blog.title: Ariis Fanfic ideas
blog.description: I just write some weird ass Fanfic troupes or something here.

body:
Villian AU

KatsuDeku

Villian!Izuku

Villain!Katsuki

Villian!Spy!Denki

Villain!Tenya

Villian!Tensei

Villian!Spy!Hitoshi

Izuku is quirkless but Katsuki never left his side. Izuku still analyzes quirks and all but has a great disliking to the Hero society. He thinks society is wrong and fucked up.

Being hated for your “villianous” quirk

Being bullied to not having one

Being worshiped for having a “heroic” one

Being told that you can’t be a hero

…

When Katsuki is attacked by the Slug villain and All Might just saves him and nearly failed to save him. Izuku is sure that despite what everyone (other than the Bakugous and his mother) have told him. He didn’t fail society, society failed him.

He tells Katsuki not to become a hero. Katsuki askes why. This is the first time Izuku comes clean to Katsuki about his constant bullying. Katsuki blows up the nearest object in his room, which was an All Might figure. Katsuki starts to question society as well.

After sometime they have an idea, they are going to destroy the Hero society!

The plan

They’re going to smuggle two people into UA as spys. Then when the times right they’ll capture the pro heros and show them what society really is like. They don’t want to kill everyone but will if they see it as necessary.

To kill

  • Endeavour
  • Stain (yes he’s a hero in this)

How they recruit everyone

Tensei and Tenya

They’re the first ones to join. They do come from a long line of heros but both got depressed under the pure pressure of their families standards. Neither became a hero. Tensei put up with a lot just to see Tenya just to be with his beloved younger brother, but as soon as Tenya got his quirk their parents put even more pressure on him than they did on Tensei. One day Tensei grappled his brother and ran. (Tenya 15, Tensei 20 [Tensei is a lot younger]) They ran away until they meet an nice lady with dark green hair that takes them home after all they looked exhausted. Izuku and Katsuki were home and saw Inko coming home with two strangers. Inko starts to prepare Dinner, they talk. Izuku and Katsuki question them they hesitate but explain who they are and why they ran. The brothers were expecting everything but a warm hug from the green haired boy. Katsuki explains to them that they did the right thing, no one should be put under so much pressure. Izuku offers them to join their little organization to take down the Hero society.

The brothers agree and so the first members have joined.

Denki

Pleople laugh at him for having a weird draw back in his quirk. People don’t like him for his bipolar personality. He is shunned from his classmates for this. Everyone tells him he can’t be a hero with that draw back, he can’t do anything right at all. He signed up for UA just to prove everyone, even his parents, wrong. He can be a hero, he just doesn’t want to. He thinks society has become toxic. No one judges anyone by their personality just by their quirks. While he’s on his way to train for the entrance exams he meets a dou of friends. (Izuku and Tenya) They seem so close. Denki never thought that he wanted something simple as a friend. Without thinking he approaches the duo and begins to talk to them when the bluette asks the threated question “What is your quirk?” Denki answers truthfully and is prepared to be shunned again when the greenette says:“Tenya… You shouldn’t just ask someone you just met about their quirk. They could be uncomfortable with it. Oh and you quirk sounds amazing!”

Denki is so surprised he asked about theirs and finds out that the literal sunshine in front of him is quirkless. Denki says that he wants to be their friend. They accept but explain that he’ll have to become a Villain for that. He agrees he hates this society anyway. He swore himself to protect his newly found boss and family.

When he met Katsuki and Tensei the became friends as well and he and Katsuki hit it of very well.

This is how they got their first spy into UA.

Hitoshi

Hitoshi always says he doesn’t care but it hurts it hurst to be hated and bullied. Expecially for something silly as his quirk. He has been self harming for a while now. While he was at the UA entrance exam he saw a group of boys. They seemed so happy. He wanted to be happy like them. Them seemed like nothing bad ever happened to them. (oh how wrong he is) He’s in the same battlefield as one of the boys in the group. As the walk to the changing room Denki keeps eyeing him. In the room Denki sees Hitoshis cuts. They do the exam but before the leave again Denki smuggled a letter into Hitoshis stuff. In said letter Denki wrote to meet hin the next day in the park.

Hitoshi goes and meets Denki. Denki asks the other about his cuts and gets the answers. The blonde states that he thinks his quirk is cool and asks if he wants to take hero society down. Hitoshi says yes and so met the rest of the squad and joins. Hitoshi hits it right of with Izuku. He as well as everyone else will do everything to protect his boss and family.

That’s how they got their second spy.

Hitoshi always says he doesn’t care but it hurts it hurst to be hated and bullied. Expecially for something silly as his quirk. He has been self harming for a while now. They do the exam but before the leave again Denki smuggled a letter into Hitoshis stuff. In said letter Denki wrote to meet hin the next day in the park.

Hitoshi goes and meets Denki. Denki asks the other about his cuts and gets the answers. The blonde states that he thinks his quirk is cool and asks if he wants to take hero society down. Hitoshi says yes and so met the rest of the squad and joins. Hitoshi hits it right of with Izuku. He as well as everyone else will do everything to protect his boss and family.

That’s how they got their second spy.

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Little bit less far
description:
by GothicPixi

Kirishima tried to hide the bad days. He had them often enough that it wasn’t too hard, and school was so hectic that people wouldn’t pay attention to his shaking hands and lack of smile. Kirishima wasn’t proud of the bad days.

Words: 1768, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Kirishima Eijirou, Ashido Mina, Kaminari Denki, Sero Hanta, Bakugou Katsuki
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki & Kirishima Eijirou, Ashido Mina & Bakugou Katsuki & Kaminari Denki & Kirishima Eijirou & Sero Hanta, Ashido Mina & Kirishima Eijirou, Kaminari Denki & Kirishima Eijirou, Kirishima Eijirou & Sero Hanta, bakusquad - Relationship, Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou
  • Additional Tags: Mental Health Issues, Anxiety, Depression mention, Bakusquad, kirishima has anxiety, I project all my struggles and emotions on to fictional characters that I love and relate to, supportive friends, Slight Kiribaku at end

trail.content_raw:
by GothicPixi

Kirishima tried to hide the bad days. He had them often enough that it wasn’t too hard, and school was so hectic that people wouldn’t pay attention to his shaking hands and lack of smile. Kirishima wasn’t proud of the bad days.

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: The tales the future holds
description:
by Blue_Eyed_Britt

Our story begins twenty years after the Kamio ward incident. Class 1-A have grown up and are pro heroes. Deku is the number one hero and has fullfilled his promise to become the naxt symbol of piece. But our story isn’t about class 1-A, its about the next generation of heroes in training.

Please forgive my shitty writing and awful summary.
Updates probably onece a week. I kinda bulk wrote the first few chapters pluss I have to work around school so please forgive me if my updates are inconsistent and if the quality varies.

Words: 496, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English
